metadata.titleEn: The rheological properties lower crust and upper mantle in southern Tibet
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原南缘流变性质
metadata.description: On April 25, 2015, Mw7.8 Nepal earthquake Himalayan main thrust fault zone in the southern Tibet, which caused obvious postseismic deformation in Nepal and southern Tibet. There are a number of work using GPS observation to constrain the rheological properties of the lower crust and upper mantle beneath southern Tibet and Himalaya. This data set summarized these results. The inferred rheological properties of the lithosphere beneath Himalayas and southern Tibet may improve our understanding to the formation and evolution of the Tibetan Plateau and help us assess the seismic hazard of this region.
metadata.descriptionCn: 2015年4月25日，Mw7.8尼泊尔地震发生在青藏高原南缘的喜马拉雅主逆冲断裂带上，此次地震在尼泊尔和青藏高原南缘造成了明显的震后变形。目前已经有多项工作采用GPS观测的震后形变约束了青藏高原南缘的下地壳和上地幔的流变性质。本数据集总结了采用2015尼泊尔地震的震后形变推测的青藏高原南缘的流变性质，该数据为评估喜马拉雅区域的地震风险，认识高喜马拉雅和青藏高原的隆升过程提供参考，也能为探测震后形变过程提供依据。
metadata.instructions:
File name: data is stored in docx file form, the name of the file is Nepal.docx
Read: this data can be directly opened by word
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：数据存储在docx文件中的表格中，文件的名称为Nepal.docx
数据读取方式：该数据可以直接用word打开

literatureList.titleEn: Overlapped Postseismic Deformation Caused by Afterslip and Viscoelastic Relaxation Following the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha (Nepal) Earthquake
literatureList.referenceEn: Diao, F., Wang, R., Xiong, X., & Liu, C. (2021). Overlapped Postseismic Deformation Caused by Afterslip and Viscoelastic Relaxation Following the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha (Nepal) Earthquake. Journal of Geophysical Research: Solid Earth, 126(3), 1–19. https://doi.org/10.1029/2020JB020378

literatureList.titleEn: Dominant Controls of Downdip Afterslip and Viscous Relaxation on the Postseismic Displacements Following the Mw7.9 Gorkha, Nepal, Earthquake
literatureList.referenceEn: Zhao, B., Bürgmann, R., Wang, D., Tan, K., Du, R., & Zhang, R. (2017). Dominant Controls of Downdip Afterslip and Viscous Relaxation on the Postseismic Displacements Following the Mw7.9 Gorkha, Nepal, Earthquake. Journal of Geophysical Research: Solid Earth, 122(10), 8376–8401. https://doi.org/10.1002/2017JB014366

literatureList.titleEn: Spatio-temporal variations of afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation following the Mw 7.8 Gorkha (Nepal) earthquake
literatureList.referenceEn: Tian, Z., Freymueller, J. T., & Yang, Z. (2020). Spatio-temporal variations of afterslip and viscoelastic relaxation following the Mw 7.8 Gorkha (Nepal) earthquake. Earth and Planetary Science Letters, 532(January). https://doi.org/10.1016/j.epsl.2019.116031

literatureList.titleEn: Observations and Modeling of Coseismic and Postseismic Deformation Due To the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha (Nepal) Earthquake
literatureList.referenceEn: Wang, Kang, & Fialko, Y. (2018). Observations and Modeling of Coseismic and Postseismic Deformation Due To the 2015 Mw 7.8 Gorkha (Nepal) Earthquake. Journal of Geophysical Research: Solid Earth, 123(1), 761–779. https://doi.org/10.1002/2017JB014620

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to assess the rheological properties of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau following the 2015 Nepal earthquake?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于评估2015年尼泊尔地震后西藏高原南缘的流变特性？
Example.AnswerEn: One example of a data collection method used to assess the rheological properties of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau following the 2015 Nepal earthquake is the use of GPS observations to measure post-seismic deformation. These measurements allow researchers to constrain the rheological properties of the lower crust and upper mantle in the region.
Example.AnswerCn: 评估2015年尼泊尔地震后西藏高原南缘流变特性的一个数据收集方法是使用GPS观测来测量后震变形。这些测量使研究人员能够约束该地区下地壳和上地幔的流变特性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features of the GPS-based post-seismic deformation data used to infer the rheological properties of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于推断西藏高原南缘流变特性的基于GPS的后震变形数据的关键特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: measurements that help constrain the rheological properties of the lower crust and upper mantle, insights into the post-seismic deformation caused by the 2015 Nepal earthquake
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 约束下地壳和上地幔流变特性的测量，以及对2015年尼泊尔地震引起的震后变形的见解。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the number of GPS observation points used to constrain the rheological properties of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau following the 2015 Nepal earthquake?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在2015年尼泊尔地震后，用于约束西藏高原南缘流变特性的GPS观测点数量是多少？
Quantification.AnswerEn: The metadata does not specify the exact number of GPS observation points used.
Quantification.AnswerCn: 元数据未指定使用的GPS观测点的确切数量。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the rheological properties of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau from post-seismic deformation patterns observed after the 2015 Nepal earthquake?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以从2015年尼泊尔地震后观察到的后震变形模式推断出西藏高原南缘的流变特性。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The post-seismic deformation patterns observed using GPS measurements after the 2015 Nepal earthquake can provide insights into the rheological properties of the lower crust and upper mantle of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau. These patterns help in evaluating seismic risks, understanding the uplift process of the High Himalayas and the Tibetan Plateau, and offering a basis for detecting post-seismic deformation processes.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 2015年尼泊尔地震后通过GPS测量观察到的后震变形模式可以为了解喜马拉雅南缘下地壳和上地幔的流变特性提供见解。这些模式有助于评估地震风险，理解高喜马拉雅山脉和青藏 Plateau的隆起过程，并为检测后震变形过程提供依据。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the determination of rheological properties of the southern Tibetan Plateau using post-seismic deformation data following the 2015 Nepal earthquake?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些因素有助于通过2015年尼泊尔地震后的后震变形数据来确定南藏高原的流变学特性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The determination of rheological properties of the southern Tibetan Plateau using post-seismic deformation data involves factors such as the GPS observations of post-seismic deformation, which help constrain the rheological characteristics of the lower crust and upper mantle in the region. This information is crucial for assessing seismic risks in the Himalayas, understanding the uplift process of the high Himalayas and the Tibetan Plateau, and providing a basis for detecting post-seismic deformation processes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 利用后震变形数据确定南藏高原的流变特性涉及多个因素，例如后震变形的GPS观测，这有助于约束该地区下地壳和上地幔的流变特征。这些信息对于评估喜马拉雅山的地震风险、理解高喜马拉雅山脉和藏高原的隆起过程，以及为检测后震变形过程提供基础至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes on seismic risk assessment in the Himalayan region if data collection methods from post-seismic deformation following the 2015 Nepal earthquake are further refined and expanded?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 如果进一步完善和扩展2015年尼泊尔地震后地震变形的数据收集方法，那么对喜马拉雅地区的地震风险评估可能产生的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The refinement and expansion of data collection methods for post-seismic deformation following the 2015 Nepal earthquake could lead to more accurate assessments of seismic risk in the Himalayan region. This would provide improved understanding of the rheological properties of the lower crust and upper mantle along the southern edge of the Tibetan Plateau, contribute to a better evaluation of earthquake hazards, and enhance the understanding of the uplift processes of the High Himalayas and Tibetan Plateau.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 对2015年尼泊尔地震后后震变形的数据收集方法进行改进和扩展，可以更准确地评估喜马拉雅地区的地震风险。这将有助于更好地理解西藏高原南缘下地壳和上地幔的流变特性，促进对地震危险的更好评估，并增强对高喜马拉雅山脉和西藏高原隆起过程的理解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to understand the rheological properties of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau after the 2015 Nepal earthquake through data collection methods like GPS observations?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 了解2015年尼泊尔地震后西藏高原南缘的流变特性非常重要，这可以通过GPS观测等数据收集方法来实现。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Understanding the rheological properties of the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau after the 2015 Nepal earthquake is crucial as it provides insights into the post-seismic deformation in the region. This knowledge aids in evaluating seismic risks in the Himalaya area, understanding the uplift process of the High Himalayas and the Tibetan Plateau, and offers a basis for detecting post-seismic deformation processes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 了解2015年尼泊尔地震后西藏高原南缘的流变特性至关重要，因为这为该地区的后震变形提供了洞察。这一知识有助于评估喜马拉雅地区的地震风险，理解高喜马拉雅山脉和西藏高原的隆起过程，并为检测后震变形过程提供基础。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are utilized to collect and analyze GPS data for studying post-seismic deformation in the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau following a significant earthquake event?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于收集和分析GPS数据以研究在重大地震事件后青藏 Plateau南缘的后震变形的方法论有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collection method involves using GPS observations to measure post-seismic deformation. This technique helps to constrain the rheological properties of the lower crust and upper mantle in the southern margin of the Tibetan Plateau. By analyzing the deformation data following the 2015 Nepal earthquake, researchers can assess seismic risks, understand the uplift process of the High Himalayas and the Tibetan Plateau, and provide a basis for detecting post-seismic deformation processes.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用GPS观测来测量地震后的变形。这种技术有助于约束西藏高原南缘下地壳和上地幔的流变特性。通过分析2015年尼泊尔地震后的变形数据，研究人员可以评估地震风险，理解高喜马拉雅山脉和西藏高原的隆起过程，并为检测地震后变形过程提供基础。
